definition: A process of creating or building something, typically referring to the design and assembly of physical structures, systems, or objects. It involves the organization and arrangement of various components or elements to form a coherent whole. This term is commonly employed in fields such as engineering, architecture, and manufacturing.

examples.german: Die Konstruktion des Gebäudes dauerte mehrere Jahre.
examples.english: The construction of the building took several years.

examples.german: Die Konstruktion der Brücke wurde von einem renommierten Architekten entworfen.
examples.english: The construction of the bridge was designed by a renowned architect.

examples.german: Die Konstruktion des Autos ist sehr stabil und sicher.
examples.english: The construction of the car is very sturdy and safe.

examples.german: Die Konstruktion des Satzes ist grammatikalisch korrekt.
examples.english: The construction of the sentence is grammatically correct.

examples.german: Die Konstruktion des neuen Flughafens hat viele Arbeitsplätze geschaffen.
examples.english: The construction of the new airport has created many jobs.
